help_security_ipv6.lang_hsi1: IPv6 Firewall allows you to customize port services for various applications. When users send these types of requests to your network via the Internet, the Router will allow those requests to the appropriate computers (also called servers).
help_security_ipv6.lang_hsi2: Note: After you have made your changes, click Save Settings to apply your changes.
help_security_ipv6.lang_hsi5: Enter keywords to describe the setting.
help_security_ipv6.lang_hsi7: Enter the IPv6 address of the computer that should receive the traffic.
help_security_ipv6.lang_hsi9: Select the protocol(s) and range of port(s) used by incoming traffic.
help_security_ipv6.lang_hsi12: This lists the entries you have created for your IPv6 firewall.
help_security_ipv6.lang_hsi13: Note: For more information, refer to the online User Guide at www.linksys.com.
